page.title: 18RECREATION
page.content: Throughout our area there is a selection of recreational activities available. {Fishing}and {windsurfing}take place on Argal Reservoir at certain times of the year.{Windsurfing, waterskiing, {swimming, boating and diving }take place around our coast nearly all the year round. {Golf}may be played at the 18 hole course near Swanpool, overlooking the sea.A smaller{Pitch and Putt}course, also near Swanpool, is suitable for all the family.On the same site is a cafe and model village. {Horse riding}is available at a few of the local farms. {Walking}around Cornwall's coastal path is a popular and enjoyable pastime.
